channel.title: American Thinker
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This is an XML content feed. It is intended to be viewed in a newsreader or syndicated to another site, subject to copyright and fair use.

item.title: The Coming Global Warming Voter Backlash
item.description: Now that the left has been exposed as spectacularly wrong on climate change, people will have to wonder: what else has the left been wrong about?

item.title: Creating Dependency, One Mouthful at a Time
item.description: What happens to a society that teaches its children that not working is the best way to get fed?

item.title: Fun with Obamacare
item.description: They passed it, now we know what's in it, so let's have fun with it, and they can deal with it.

item.title: Republicans need to Change the Way They Think
item.description: Things are not as bleak as they may seem -- as long as Republicans can learn from the past and plan accordingly.

item.title: Visit Chicago for a Rollickin' Clockwork Orange Time, O My Brothers
item.description: It seems that Anthony Burgess was a more horrorshow prophet than even he might have liked. Viddy well, brothers.

item.title: Sanitizing Mel Weinberg and the Horrors of Abscam
item.description: A thirty year-old scandal is suddenly new again, as a film is currently being produced in Hollywood about Abscam, with big money and big name talent behind it. The truth appears to be optional.

item.title: The Fed's Deadly Instrument of Speculation
item.description: And its inextricable situation.

item.title: Confronting an Anti-bullying Campaign in San Francisco
item.description: White males are the only bullies?

item.title: It's Almost 3 AM and North Korea's Calling
item.description: President Obama has a situation on his hands where charisma and media support do him no good.

item.title: Facing the Hardest Truth on Public Education
item.description: A time for righteous anger, and the will to put a stop to more than a century of forced intellectual and moral decline.

item.title: Using Conservative Jujitsu on Progressives
item.description: Conservatives should take every opportunity to expose Progressive hypocrisy about, and cynicism toward, the very culture they themselves are creating -- sucker punching when necessary.

item.title: The VA: a Culture of Disconnect
item.description: The VA has become the poster child of an incompetent, complacent American health care system.

item.title: Has Benjamin Netanyahu's Apology Opened a Pandora's Box for Israel?
item.description: The Turkish delight that Netanyahu presented on a golden platter to Erdogan only fueled Turkey's sense of invincibility against the dhimmi Yahudi.

item.title: Stomping on Jesus: The Iconoclasm of the Left
item.description: The attempt to wipe out Christian symbols and to achieve the Leftist goal of the total secularization of American society continues apace even though the majority of Americans are at least nominally Christian.

item.title: Eerily Authentic: The Americans
item.description: An example of ongoing political warfare, perfected by the KGB during the Cold War, was unintentionally revealed recently.

item.title: How Liberals Corrode Society
item.description: Across the Western world, ordinary people come up with new means of expressing human decency and just plain niceness -- and here come our intellectual superiors to undermine it.

item.title: Warm and well fed, or hungry in the dark?
item.description: Which is worse - gradual man-made global warming or sudden electricity blackout?

item.title: Family Fortunes and the I.R.S.
item.description: A memo for April 15: it could be worse.

item.title: Critical Considerations for Immigration Reform
item.description: How can we ever hope to solve this problem if we refuse to consider what's really wrong?

item.title: Bringing Down America: A Review
item.description: "Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it." This is where we start remembering and stop repeating.

item.title: To Hell with Christians
item.description: It's a bad time to be a Christian in the Middle East. Even worse to be a Christian pastor.

item.title: Speaking Truth to the Media on Israel: The Masharawi Case
item.description: An unlikely defender of Israel blows wide open the latest mainstream-media propaganda campaign.

item.title: ObamaCare Bites Unionized Educators
item.description: Obama will be chuckling all the way.

item.title: Global Warming? Oops! Never Mind!
item.description: The only way you can get global warming hysteria is if you ask ridiculous questions and then try to answer them.

item.title: The Class Action Racket
item.description: The class action vehicle is broken in a way that the people who run it -- lawyers -- and the people who are in a position to fix it -- judges and legislators -- are benefitting from the status quo.
